title: Do you guys still have any hope for mid season?
body:
Few months ago I was like "alright, let's wait midseason updates, maybe they can bring back something interesting", but now... I don't know, I feel like I have lost all faith. Just look at the hot threads in the forums, it's all people rightfully complaining. Riot already backpedaled on the botlane/AD+Support changes; they keep making promises they do not keep. They think we're stupid or something, I don't know; also they haven't released any stats on the game since a long time.

All hope is lost for me, brothers.
Please, bring light

replies.body:
Nah I have no hope. 

Players said when new runes were introduced, "Guys stop complaining, this is something new that will take a while to fix." 

Then in pre-season while we were still complaining people would say, "Guys its only preseason, Riot will have this all fixed when season starts." 

Then season started and still no changes and people say, "Just give em 3 months, it takes time for them to balance it." 

3 months later and people are now saying "Mid season Riot said theyd fix the game on bot lane." 

Let's be honest, if Riot wanted this game fixed they could do it. There are hundreds of posts on the forums a day complaining about too much damage, catchup exp, how 1 man can make you lose but 1 man cant win the game. Riot likes the game like this because its what the Korean players prefer.
Next patch they are changing the shut down gold rules to help with one person bringing down a whole team.

The 8.9 prelim notes are up and it seems they are nerfing mana yet again, like huge mana per level loss on every mage in the game and no more mana on Doran ring except a 5m per 5s.

The gutting of tank support continues tomorrow, and the cannon minions are going to be worth *even more* gold.

This whole season is like a preseason. There will be no midseason.
